/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades adorned with numerous windows that reflect the clear blue sky above. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On either side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban environment. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, under a sky devoid of clouds, further enhancing the vibrancy of the scene.
